attributes.action: ban the use of antipsychotic drugs in the treatment of dementia and to outlaw the common practice of sedating the elderly for "convenience" and economic purposes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dementia does not diminish a person's entitlement to love and affection, nor does it diminish his/her ability to have a spiritual life. Too many elderly people are being sedated for "convenience" and this is a crime which we should oppose and a practice we should outlaw.

KINDNESS NOT CHEMICALS

COMPASSION NOT CONVENIENCE
